LanguageData.LotRE_ANewTerritory.scenario.label: Elves - A New Territory
LanguageData.LotRE_ANewTerritory.scenario.description: Decisions on the high council have led to sending four settlers to new lands. Will they create a thriving city or a grand fortress?
LanguageData.LotRE_ANewTerritory.scenario.summary: Four Elves set up to help found a new Elven territory.
